Moo::RenderSetSplit::BoneRelation

Moo::RenderSetSplit::BoneRelation Class Reference

This helper class handles and manipulates the relationship between different bones in a renderset to ease splitting. More...

Detailed Description

This helper class handles and manipulates the relationship between different bones in a renderset to ease splitting.
